Instructions for compilation

Download the source code from here.

In order to compile the source code you must use Make. From the root project directory execute:

  • make if you want to compile the code in info mode. Info mode will simply log error message in the logging files.

  • make debug if you want to compile the code in debug mode. Debug mode will log all messages in the logging files, not only errors.

Further instructions about using the library are given at the main project's README. This documentation is exclusively about the code.
